basic.floral_language:
Spathiphyllum kochii 
Floriography: self-confidence, pure and good 
Spathiphyllum kochii white, originated in tropical rainforests, a symbol of the smooth sailing. Smooth sailing like anthurium, has a unique spathe. Flower buds are pure and fresh, and inflorescence simple but elegant, graceful, last very long, eagerly anticipated by his just like a pure girl. 
Maintenance is simple, can bloom all year round, flowering for 2-3 months.
basic.blooming: Flowers year around with spathe flower, viewing period 2-3 months
basic.color: Flower color pure white, emerald green

maintenance.soil: Peat covered with a layer of sphagnum moss on soil surface to keep moisture
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, should put in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray water in the air or on leaves, reduce water in winter, keep soil moist
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply liquid fertilizers 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove rotten roots, old diseased and dead leaves timely
